sentences.cn: “爱德华，你真顽皮。”多萝西斥责道。

sentences.en: And Moses said unto them, Why chide ye with me?
sentences.cn: 摩西对他们说, 你们为什么与我争闹?

sentences.en: And Moses said unto them, Why chide ye with me? wherefore do ye tempt the LORD?
sentences.cn: 摩西对他们说, 你们为什么与我争闹? 为什么试探耶和华 呢 ?

sentences.en: Emilia . Do not you chide; I have a thing for you.
sentences.cn: 爱米利娅 不要骂; 我有一件好东西给你.

sentences.en: Have we got any business to chide it?
sentences.cn: 我们有何理由责备它 呢 ?

sentences.en: He will not always chide; neither will he keep his anger for ever.
sentences.cn: 他不长久责备, 也不永远怀怒.

sentences.en: However, them will chide you if you try to speak French.
sentences.cn: 但假如你试图讲法语, 就会遭到她们的责骂.

sentences.en: However, they will chide you if you try to speak French.
sentences.cn: 但你试图讲法语, 就会遭到他们的责骂.

sentences.en: Moses answered them: Why chide you with me ? Wherefore do you tempt the Lord?
sentences.cn: 梅瑟回答他们说: [你们为什麽与我争吵,为什麽试探上主?

sentences.en: Wherefore the people did chide with Moses, and said, Give us water that we may drink.
sentences.cn: 所以与摩西争闹, 说, 给我们水喝吧.

trans.tran_cn: 呵叱，责骂，责备，（风，猎犬等）怒号，咆哮
trans.tran_en: to tell someone that you do not approve of something that they have done or said
